definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: At that time, the public order in Dingxiang was very chaotic.
sentences.chinese: 当时定襄的社会治安十分混乱。

sentences.english: The Security Administration Punishment Law being paid close attention to has been enacted recently.
sentences.chinese: 倍受瞩目的《治安管理处罚法》新近出台。

sentences.english: The Squire presided, dignified and tall.
sentences.chinese: 尊严的治安官当主席，身材笔挺。

sentences.english: A Magistrates’ court sits without a jury.
sentences.chinese: 治安法庭审察时没有陪审团。

sentences.english: The constable in town has a steam engine.
sentences.chinese: 镇里的治安官有一台蒸汽机。

sentences.english: He was bound over to keep the peace by magistrates.
sentences.chinese: 治安官命他具结保证不扰乱治安。

sentences.english: He was bound over to keep the peace by magistrates.
sentences.chinese: 治安官命他具结保证不扰乱治安。

sentences.english: You'll report to me here. Butthe Consulate Security Man must not know that I am in Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 但是领事馆的治安官不能知道我在伊斯坦布尔。

sentences.english: The steps of applying the IIPS to evaluate are discussed in the following.
sentences.chinese: 给出了应用综合治安指数进行评估的步骤。

sentences.english: Only when security guards fired shots in the air did the crowd disperse.
sentences.chinese: 治安警察向空中鸣后，人群才疏散开。

sentences.english: The person who disturbed the peace should be punished.
sentences.chinese: 扰乱治安的人应该受到惩罚。

sentences.english: Too late. He must go before the magistrate now.
sentences.chinese: 太晚了，他必须现在就去见治安推事。

sentences.english: We should acclaim and support the heroic resistance of Feng Chih-an's troops.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该赞扬和拥护冯治安部的英勇抗战。

sentences.english: He's the sheriff at Twin Gulch, Idaho, and I'm his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 他是爱达荷州特温加尔奇的治安官，我是他的副手。

sentences.english: In view of the age of the accused the magistrate give him a suspend sentence.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于被告的年龄，治安法官给他缓期处刑。

sentences.english: Corporatist family polices are based on gender differences and ethos of the housewife .
sentences.chinese: 组合主义家庭维持治安根据主妇的性别和性格。

definition: to impose martial law/to impose emergency measures
special duty (e.g. extra security or traffic control on special occasions)/person on special duty
to garrison/to stand guard/on garrison duty
local government bylaw enforcement officer/city management (abbr. for 城市管理行政執法局|城市管理行政执法局[Cheng2 shi4 Guan3 li3 Xing2 zheng4 Zhi2 fa3 ju2])
